api_key.name: iLert API Key
api_key.description: Your iLert API key (Bearer token). Get it from iLert → Settings → API Keys.

mqtt_host.name: MQTT Host
mqtt_host.description: MQTT broker hostname. Default: core-mosquitto (the Mosquitto addon).

mqtt_user.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_user.description: MQTT username configured in Mosquitto addon.

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: MQTT password configured in Mosquitto addon.

poll_interval.name: Poll Interval
poll_interval.description: How often to fetch data from iLert (in seconds). Default: 300 (5 minutes).

log_level.name: Log Level
log_level.description: Logging verbosity. Use 'debug' to troubleshoot issues.

calendar_entity.name: Calendar Entity (Optional)
calendar_entity.description: Sync on-call shifts to a Local Calendar. First create a Local Calendar integration in HA (Settings → Devices & Services → Add Integration → Local Calendar), then enter the entity ID here (e.g., calendar.ilert_on_call). Leave empty to disable calendar sync.
